text: Old Chalford is a hamlet in Enstone civil parish, about east of Chipping Norton, Oxfordshire. Old Chalford is on the River Glyme, which is dammed in the hamlet forming a number of ponds. The Wychwood Way long distance footpath passes through the hamlet. About southeast of Old Chalford are old earthworks and ruins of limestone walls which are the remains of the deserted medieval village of Nether Chalford. ==References== Category:Hamlets in Oxfordshire Category:West Oxfordshire District
title: Old Chalford
